choices.A: Set the FSPF interface link cost to be less than 30,000 in the IVR path.
choices.D: Set the FSPF hello interval on fc1/12 interface the NX9k-01-LAB switch.
choices.C: Configure the FSPF for VSAN 10 on the NX9k-01-LAB switch.
choices.B: Configure the VSAN ID 10 on the link connected to fc1/12.

questions.question_text:
The script fails to convert a JSON variable into a Python dictionary. Which action resolves the issue?

//IMG//

choices.B: Define a json_output as a YAML object, yaml json_output
choices.C: Fix the JSON syntax by modifying “attribures” to “attribures”:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
It' s C, ":" missing
Shouldn't this be B and E?

choices.B: Filter HSRP traffic by using a Layer 3 VACL on the OTV edge devices.
choices.D: Filter HSRP traffic by using a Layer 3 VACL on the ESXi vSwitch.
choices.E: Filter HSRP by using a Layer 2 MAC list on the OTV edge devices.
choices.C: Filter HSRP by using a Layer 2 MAC list on the ESXi vSwitch.

questions.question_text: A customer configures HSRP between two data centers that are interconnected with OTV. The configuration succeeds, but traffic between two ESXi virtual hosts on the same site is routed suboptimally through the OTV overlay. Which two actions optimize the traffic? (Choose two.)

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer is experiencing a problem when running a Docker container inside the Cisco Nexus 9000 bash shell. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.B: Connect to bash as a different user

choices.A: Add the DNS server and suffix.
choices.E: Export the http_proxy and https_proxy environment variables.
choices.D: Configure domain-name and nameserver under the management VRF.
choices.B: Add a default gateway and nameserver.
choices.C: Install the unbound resolver package using curl.
